title: Questions: Personal Information (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Personal Information subcategory within Questions. Includes 3 card(s).

cards.english: What's your phone number? / What's the phone number?
cards.japanese: 電話番号は何番ですか。

cards.romaji: Ano hito no namae wa nan desu ka.
cards.japanese: あの人の名前は何ですか。
